price: 他们说：“我们的养主啊！我们的薄命，曾制服我们，而我们变成迷误者。
arabic: قَالُواْ رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتۡ عَلَيۡنَا شِقۡوَتُنَا وَكُنَّا قَوۡمٗا ضَآلِّينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qālū rabbanā ghalabat ʿalaynā shiq'watunā wakunnā qawman ḍāllīna
